medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain began at approximately 6pm yesterday as diffuse abdominal pain, progressed to localized right side pain worsened by movements, especially sitting and standing. Nausea, vomiting, and subjective fevers and chills developed. At evaluation, the patient reports pain improved with narcotics but ongoing nausea and right sided abdominal pain that bothers her most when sitting up to use the commode. Denies ongoing fevers or chills.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Left elbow and knee surgery; otherwise healthy.
